entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
